lyrics.stanza: By listening (echo) I can obey (echo) All of the words (echo) My parents say. (echo)
Obedience, love, joy, and peace, Daily these must all increase In the proper boys and girls Who are the Lord's.
A heart of love (echo) Is one that's kind, (echo) Forgiving is (echo) One of its signs. (echo)
I, child of joy (echo) When friends are sad (echo) With tearful words, (echo) Will make them glad. (echo)
Peacemakers are (echo) What we should be; (echo) Speaking kind words (echo) Making harmony. (echo)
